recipeIngredientRows.purchaseProductName: CHEESE, MOZZARELLA SLICED .75 OZ LOW-MOISTURE-PART-SKIM TRAY REF

recipeMethods.stepInstructions:
1. Wash and core whole tomatoes. 

2. Using a slicer, slice tomatoes 1/4" thick and place in a storage 
container until ready for use. Store at 41°F or below.

3. Slice Grilled Chicken Breast into four equal pieces lengthwise. Put in container and store for later use at 40°F or below.

1. Cut roll in half, lengthwise.

2. Spread 1 oz of Caesar Dressing on the bottom half of the bread.

3. Evenly layer 3.5 oz of sliced grilled chicken over the entire surface
of the bottom of the sandwich.

4. Layer 2 slices (1 oz) of Mozzarella cheese over the sliced chicken.

5. Place sandwich on screen and toast for 1.5 mins at 500°F. 

6. Squeeze 1 oz of Caesar dressing on the toasted top half of the 
Vienna roll. 

7. Top with 2.5 oz of shredded romaine and 3 slices of tomatoes. 

8. Wrap sandwich in paper.
